events.title: UNO Reverse Alibi
events.short: Solve the case… but only after flipping the clues.
events.details: Use UNO reverse cards to create the perfect alibi in this mystery game.

events.title: Wild Card Auction
events.short: Pick your players, flip your luck
events.details: Strategic auction game where players bid on wild cards to build winning hands.

events.title: UNO Frame: Capture the Colors
events.short: See the world in four colors — Red, Blue, Green, Yellow.
events.details: A creative photography challenge where participants must capture the world through UNO's four primary colors.
events.time: 30th - 11 am to 1 pm, 31st - 10 am to 1 pm

events.title: Draw 4 Arena: The Ultimate Esports Showdown
events.short: Lock and load. Spike planted. It's time to dominate.
events.details: Ultimate esports battlefield featuring Call of Duty Mobile and Valorant competitions across 2 days.

events.title: Skip the Obvious
events.short: Follow the clues… unless the card tells you to skip.
events.details: Puzzle challenge where you must skip obvious answers to find hidden solutions.

events.title: WILD PROMPT
events.short: Unleash creativity. Master prompts. Expect the unexpected.
events.details: Wild Prompt is a fast-paced creative challenge where teams use AI to turn unexpected ideas into powerful visuals using Google Gemini.

events.title: Logic Reverse: The Brain Battle
events.short: Reverse the Logic. Win the Game.
events.details: High-intensity logic-reverse brain battle where mathematics and analytics collide with Flip, Skip, and Draw-style twists.

events.title: Color Chaos
events.short: Unleash creativity. Master prompts. Expect the unexpected.
events.details: Fast-paced creative challenge exploring prompt engineering + AI image generation using Google Gemini with UNO-style cards and Wild Flip twists.
